name: v1.29.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazel_features", version = "1.29.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "bazel_features",
    sha256 = "d852f389ce8db8b8c2f9807a4faf065b0d0ba302163898cd2428b6ca7d086681",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_features-1.29.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/releases/download/v1.29.0/bazel_features-v1.29.0.tar.gz",
)
load("@bazel_features//:deps.bzl", "bazel_features_deps")
bazel_features_deps()
```


## What's Changed
* Add feature for `use_target_platform_constraints` by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/97
* Add feature for analysis_test_transition() on experimental/incompatible flags by @hvadehra in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/98


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/compare/v1.27.0...v1.29.0

name: v1.10.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazel_features", version = "1.10.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark

    name = "bazel_features",
    sha256 = "95fb3cfd11466b4cad6565e3647a76f89886d875556a4b827c021525cb2482bb",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_features-1.10.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/releases/download/v1.10.0/bazel_features-v1.10.0.tar.gz",
)
load("@bazel_features//:deps.bzl", "bazel_features_deps")
bazel_features_deps()
```

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/compare/v1.9.1...v1.10.0

body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark

```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark

    sha256 = "53182a68f172a2af4ad37051f82201e222bc19f7a40825b877da3ff4c922b9e0",

)

bazel_features_deps()
```


## What's Changed
* Add download_has_headers_param feature by @mortenmj in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/30
* chore(deps): update bazel-contrib/.github action to v5 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/23
* Add feature for instrumented_files_info(metadata_files = ...) by @phst in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/35
* Add swift_fragment_removed setting by @keith in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/36

## New Contributors
* @phst made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/35
* @keith made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/36

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/compare/v1.2.0...v1.3.0
